fullText: Laura Linney delivers a performance of such stunning simplicity and grace that she makes you forget you're watching theater at all.
dtliExcerpt: Laura Linney delivers a performance of such stunning simplicity and grace that she makes you forget you're watching theater at all.
bwwExcerpt: That's Laura Linney, the venerable actress, who stars in the one-woman play, adapted from Elizabeth Strout's novel, that opened on Broadway Wednesday night. It's a skilled performance that employs the actress's signature move: commanding the stage while remaining genteel and dignified.
showScoreExcerpt: Laura Linney delivers a performance of such stunning simplicity and grace that she makes you forget you're watching theater at all.
